channel.title: CVE Feed for HPE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HPE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28083|2023-03-22T04:39:47.581424Z -- hpe -- integrated%20lights-out
item.description: A remote Cross-site Scripting vulnerability was discovered in HPE Integrated Lights-Out 6 (iLO 6), Integrated Lights-Out 5 (iLO 5) and Integrated Lights-Out 4 (iLO 4). HPE has provided software updates to resolve this vulnerability in HPE Integrated Lights-Out.

item.title: CVE-2023-50271|2023-12-17T14:49:53.516Z -- hpe -- hpe%20system%20management%20homepage%20%28smh%29
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified with HP-UX System Management Homepage (SMH). This vulnerability could be exploited locally or remotely to disclose information.
